meanings.definition: The side of a coin or medal that bears the main design or inscription.
meanings.sent1: The obverse of the coin displayed a portrait of a famous leader.
meanings.sent2: The obverse of the medal featured intricate artwork.
meanings.sent3: When the coin landed on its obverse, it seemed to wink at me.
meanings.sent4: The obverse of the coin whispered tales of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The shiny obverse of the coin gleamed under the light.

meanings.definition: Facing or turned towards the observer.
meanings.sent1: The obverse side of the building had a grand entrance.
meanings.sent2: She admired the obverse view of the mountains from her window.
meanings.sent3: The obverse direction led us straight to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: His obverse gaze made her heart skip a beat.
meanings.sent5: The obverse smile on her face brightened up the room.
